snippet.title: The Wall - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Ive been away for a couple of months and this is why! The Wall Official Trailer is here. A cyberpunk Wall Defence Game where you have to hold back hordes of zombies from getting to Kron City.

Demo out 17th of Feb and Full Release will be 4th of March
If you'd like to support myself and the channel give it a little Wishlist using the link below. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3487830/The_Wall/?beta=0

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPaIa_NCjaWafmnDd1rrEVw/join
